name: Car Parking Game 3D
description:
This game is no walk in the park. It’s a super fun, high-speed, precision game of skill!
Awesome action packed parking with tons of extra cool bonuses and perks, is what you can expect!

Get behind the wheels of some of the coolest cars you have ever seen. Drive, customize, upgrade and tune up your dream cars and then feel the power as your tear the wheels off in a fast paced race to the parking spaces! Hot rims, cool paint jobs, and excellent handling characteristics make this game of speedy and accurate driving well-worth playing a few thousand times!

*****************************************************************************************************

Car Parking Game 3D FEATURES:

• Car driving fun
• 4 amazing game modes
• 18 sweet exotic cars that you can customize
• 2 challenging parking lots with hundred of levels to complete
• High precision driving and parking skills that will blow your doors off
• Customize your cars with 6 car upgrades, 24 body colors, and 50 shiny rims
• Brilliantly detailed gaming with some of the coolest driving effects seen in few games

*****************************************************************************************************

This tear squealing, stunt wheeling, game of driving skill will have you getting behind the wheel of your virtual cars all the time. The awesome precision car driving challenges and sweet upgrades all add up to one of the most amazing driving sport games in app stores anywhere!
Get behind the wheel and make the tires squeal!

********************************************************************************************************
